title: TrafficSituation announcement.
description: Structural representation of a traffic situation containing its key elements and all the language versions of announcements sent by Finnish Transportation Agency.

locationToDisplay.title: LocationToDisplay schema.
locationToDisplay.description: Location to display in ETRS-TM35FIN coordinate format.

announcements.title: Announcements schema.
announcements.description: Contains announcement's different language versions available.

language.title: Language schema.
language.description: Language of the announcement eq. fi, sv, en or ru.

items.title: Feature schema.
items.description: Feature describes characteristics and qualities of the situation.

endTime.title: EndTime schema.
endTime.description: End time of the situation. If the end time has been passed, the situation can be assumed to be over. If end time is not given, there will be follow-up announcement about the situation.

estimatedDuration.title: EstimatedDuration schema.
estimatedDuration.description: If exact endtime is not known, duration may be estimated informally eq. '1 - 3 hours'.

location.title: Location schema
location.description: Location of an traffic situation announcement

countryCode.title: Country code
countryCode.description: AlertC country code defined by RDS (IEC 62106)

locationTableNumber.title: Location table number
locationTableNumber.description: AlertC location table number. Country code + location table number fully identifies the table.

area-location.title: Area location
area-location.description: Location consisting of one or more areas.

locationCode.title: Location code of the area
locationCode.description: Number of the road point in AlertC location table

road-address-location.title: Road address location
road-address-location.description: Location consisting of a single road point or a road segment between two road points

directionDescription.title: DirectionDescription schema.
directionDescription.description: Human readable description of the affected direction

road-point.title: Road point schema
road-point.description: Description of a single road point

country.title: Country schema.
country.description: Usually Finland, but may be something else eq. Sweden, Norway, Russia.

roadAddress.title: RoadAddress schema.
roadAddress.description: Location in road address (road number + number of the road section + distance from the beginning of the road section.

distance.title: Distance schema.
distance.description: Distance from the beginning of the road section.

roadName.title: RoadName schema.
roadName.description: Name of the road where the accident happened.

locationCode.title: AlertC location code
locationCode.description: Number of the location point in AlertC location table

distance.title: Distance from the road point
distance.description: Distance of the road point from the AlertC location point
